scripts.serve:functions: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:npm_config_loglevel='error'; $env:npm_config_fund='false'; $env:npm_config_audit='false'; Set-Location -LiteralPath 'firebase'; npx -y firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions --project mbapp-dev-2025-noor"
scripts.serve:backend: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:npm_config_loglevel='error'; $env:npm_config_fund='false'; $env:npm_config_audit='false'; Set-Location -LiteralPath 'firebase'; npx -y firebase-tools emulators:start --only functions,firestore,auth,storage,pubsub --project mbapp-dev-2025-noor"
